name: Point to Point
info: Point to point race run by Orwell this year
Sign on at Blue Gardenia, first riders off at 7pm sharp to beat the light
Neutralised until Manor Kilbride, the route will head straight for Valleymount, around the Poulaphouca lap and then back along the route to finish at Ballysmuttan
The race may be handicapped depending on numbers
The groups tend to split so remember when you're off the back of your main group to cycle with the same caution you would on open roads
The Ambulance will be the last vehicle on the road and once you're behind it, you're out of the race
Sign on closes at 6:50pm as we have to get racers off on time
